name: Eat the Trash
description:
You are the endangered Trash-Cannius-Fishius you are the only one left of your kind because your species were hunted into extinction. Your job is to eat as much trash as possible and clean the ocean to save the other fish. You have a hunger timer when it runs out you lose. You get score depending on the kind of trash you eat.

Scoring System:

Chocy Milk: 3 points.

Not Coke  : 1 Point.

Trash Bag : 1 Point.

Possible Updates:

Enemies

Other Trash

Better UI
